articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 1017
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 1017
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, inspected Unit 1017 of the KPA Air Force honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and guided its flight training.
					 He was greeted on the spot by KPA General Ri Pyong Chol, commander of the KPA Air Force, and commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 He spent hours outside the command post despite strong wind to guide the flight training of airmen.
					
					 Satisfied to watch the trustworthy airmen in training, he said that all of them conducted valiant and bold training.
					
					 Recognizing Hero of the DPRK Ho Ryong who was commanding the flight, he praised him once again for his courageous combat action taken to beat back the intrusion into the territorial air of the country by a U.S. imperialist strategic reconnaissance plane.
					
					 After looking round the plane honored with the inspection by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he praised the service personnel for taking good care of the plane. 
					
					 He had a photo session with service personnel of the unit.
					
					 He gave the unit precious teachings, going round combat and technical apparatuses and military objects newly manufactured by it through a drive to modernize arms and equipment.
					
					 He highly praised the unit for performing its combat duty in a responsible manner while following the enemy's moves for aggression with vigilance and not slackening the high combat alertness even a moment.
					
					 Then he made the rounds of the service members' hall of the unit, a bedroom, mess hall and lecture room of the airmen of the sub-unit of the unit.
					
					 At the service members' hall, he underlined the need to continue directing big efforts to the political and ideological education to train all the airmen and soldiers as ones strong in idea and faith.
					
					 At the flight control drill hall he watched with keen attention airmen in cockpit training. He learned in detail about their training, creating different situations to be settled by them. 
					
					 Walking the ground for foot flight training, he praised the airmen for making it part of their daily life to undergo flight training, thinking of the sky awake or asleep. 
					
					 At the kitchen he told the cooks that airmen like food when it is prepared by diverse methods, even if they use the same foodstuff, urging them to prepare meals in such a way as to cater to the taste of the airmen.
					
					 Seated before the table for airmen, he recollected the words of Kim Jong Il that he would invite those airmen who were successful in the training held on Dec. 16 last year to visit Pyongyang, meet them and dine with them. 
					
					 He visited the family of Ho Ryong, commander of the unit.
					
					 He kindly shook the hand of his wife Kim Jong Sil and went round each room of their house.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the couple. 
					
					 He went outside when darkness was gathering. He asked her to tell the wives of the airmen that he hoped they would take better care of their husbands.

articles.title: WPK Replies to Foreign Parties over Condolatory Messages
articles.content:
WPK Replies to Foreign Parties over Condolatory Messages
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent replies to parties of various countries over their messages expressing deep condolences over the demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK sent a message of deep thanks to the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, the State Council of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China for their heartfelt condolences.
					
					 The reply messages of the WPK Central Committee went to the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the general secretary of the Mongolian People's Party, the C.C., People's Party of Cambodia, the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia and the C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary: "U.S. Pacific Century" and Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary: "U.S. Pacific Century" and Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently made public a new defense strategy the keynote of which is to maintain its "position as a world leader". 
					 Timed to coincide with this, the U.S. military warlike forces made the story about "provocation and threat" from the DPRK an established fact, talking about "worst scenario" and "uncertainty".
					
					 What does this mean?
					
					 The Asia-Pacific region is now becoming a center of world forces. 
					
					 The U.S. is keen to make the 21st century a "U.S. Pacific century" in a bid to emerge an emperor of the world. 
					
					 The "U.S. Pacific century" is, in essence, a new version of the U.S. foreign policy to monopolize the political and economic interests in Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 In a word, the U.S. announcement of its new defense strategy is aimed at formally spelling out a war strategy of putting importance to Asia-Pacific and directing its spearhead to the DPRK and China. 
					
					 Its goal is to intensify the military infiltration and interference in the region by sparking a crisis and escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula. Its ultimate purpose is to pressurize China, its biggest strategic rival, by force of arms and control Asia-Pacific and keep world supremacy. 
					
					 It is part of the U.S. scenario that it is providing military support and encouragement to south Korea, Japan and other allies, while overstating "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The dangerous and reactionary nature of the U.S. new defense strategy lies in its moves to deter other powers from exercising their influence over the region and enlarging their beat by force and build an order of U.S.-led imperialist domination. 
					
					 The U.S. unlimited imperialist greed and military adventures are posing a grave menace to peace and stability in the region and increasing the danger of a new Cold War there. 
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can make the 21st century a U.S.-led 'Pacific century" from an outdated hegemonic viewpoint. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to forget the historical fact that it drank a bitter cup of defeat in Korea last century.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Unite for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Unite for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The victory of national reunification movement hinges on the strong will and concerted efforts of the Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a by-lined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The reunification movement of the Korean nation is a movement of the Koreans which advances thanks to their great patriotic zeal and devoted struggle. It is, at the same time, a nationwide movement which can succeed only when all Koreans pool their efforts and unite close in their struggle.
					
					 For Koreans to depend on foreign forces and allow their domination and interference is as foolish an act as abandoning their national rights of their own accord though they are responsible for national reunification.
					
					 Since ancient times, Koreans have been known to be strong in unity and they have pooled efforts and wisdom in their struggle against aggressors and to achieve national sovereignty. 
					
					 Only when all Koreans at home and abroad fully display the spirit of independence, the spirit of rejecting outside forces, by preserving the peculiarities of the nation's tradition, and the patriotic resolution to save the destiny of the nation, will the driving force for national reunification grow stronger and is it possible to meet any challenge of the separatist forces at home and abroad.
					
					 Whoever loves the country and the nation and stands for national reunification should unite under the banner of national reunification irrespective of ideology, system and religious belief.
					
					 Differing ideology, system and religious belief can never be reasons for Koreans of various strata to fail to unite in the struggle for national reunification. This is proven by the achievements and experience gained in the nation's movement for reunification which has made dynamic progress under the banner of the north-south joint declaration. 
					
					 All the Koreans, be they in the north and the south and abroad, have a noble national duty to devote their efforts and wisdom as those responsible for the movement for national reunification and thus contribute to reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning 
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The world progressive people are required to wage a positive struggle to decisively foil the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning by seeing through its vicious nature, danger and grave consequences. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article. 
					 Bourgeois ideology, culture and the decadent way of life are the most reactionary and unpopular ones as they represent and protect the interests of the capitalist class and reflect their class stand and way of life. This amounts to very dangerous ideological virus making the people mentally crippled and morally degenerated, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 When people are taken in by bourgeois ideology and culture, they will be reduced to ungrateful snobs bereft of faith who neither know the party and leader nor their country and people. Consequently, the power, army and people will be torn apart. 
					
					 Bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning has a very harmful impact on the young people, in particular. 
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the imperialists spend the bulk of their state budget to this project and mobilize a lot of manpower for it, openly blustering they can bring down through bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning the countries which they fail to do even with nukes. 
					
					 The historical experience proves that if people fail to strictly guard against the poisoning by all hues of unsound ideas and culture spread by the imperialists and wage a fierce struggle against it, they can never check it, concludes the article.

articles.title: New Poster Produced
articles.content:
New Poster Produced
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK produced a new poster on the Day of the Shining Star.
					 On Jan. 12 the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea released a special report on instituting February 16, the birthday of general secretary Kim Jong Il, as the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The poster, the first of its kind since the day was instituted, represents the firm faith and will of all service personnel and people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever. 
					
					 Depicted in the poster is Kim Jong Il's old home in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu against the background of Jong Il Peak standing high. Engraved in bold relief on it is Kimjongilia, immortal flower. Seen there are letters "70th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il", "The Day of the Shining Star" and "Commemoration."
					
					 The poster helps recall with deep emotion the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, who, born in Mt. Paektu amid snowstorm, led the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence to victory for several decades and made a long journey in a snowstorm till the last moments of his great life.

articles.title: New Posters Inspire Korean People in Economic Construction
articles.content:
New Posters Inspire Korean People in Economic Construction
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The capital city of Pyongyang has new posters displayed in streets.
					 The new posters call for thoroughly implementing the tasks set forth by the joint slogans of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and by the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 Seen in Chollima and Podnamu (willow) streets and other parts of the city is a poster reading "Let all turn out in carrying out the tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial!"
					
					 The poster portrays a worker calling for carrying out the joint editorial's tasks through a fresh upsurge.
					
					 It also contains pictures of fluttering flags with such letters as "Industrial revolution in the new century", "Increased production", "Improvement of people's living standard" and "Thorough implementation". 
					
					 Another poster says, "Make the year 2012 a year when great achievements are made in light industry, a year when people enjoy the benefit of light industry!" The poster, displayed in Chongnyon Street, calls for bringing about a great innovation and a great leap in the light industrial sector. 
					
					 A poster reading "Raise the level of the technical equipment of the national economy to that of the Ryonha Machine!" reflects the requirement of the industrial revolution in the new century through a picture of a conventional machine being replaced with a modern one.
					
					 Other posters read "Hit the target for iron and steel production without fail by dint of the mental strength of Kangson!", "Direct primary efforts to solving power shortage!" and "Make the Mansudae area filled with grand monumental structures of lasting value!"
					
					 The posters inspire the people in their effort for implementing this year's tasks.

articles.title: Koreans at Home and Abroad to Have Medical Symposium in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Koreans at Home and Abroad to Have Medical Symposium in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The 14th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad will be held on May 3 and 4 under the sponsorship of the Medical Association of Korea.
					 Ri Ung, a department director of the Central Committee of the association, told KCNA:
					
					 "The symposium is held early in May every year and scholars of medicine who hope to participate in the symposium should submit papers until March.
					
					 Those who have not submitted papers and members of organizations of supporters may take seats for the public in the symposium. 
					
					 The symposium will be held, divided into all branches, including neuro surgery and internal medicine of respiratory organs.
					
					 Clinics, lectures, joint operations and sightseeing in scenic spots are also expected during the symposium.
					
					 The Medical Association of Korea is making full preparations to provide every possible convenience to the participants.
					
					 The association is a permanent scientific, social organization of health workers. 
					
					 It, founded on June 19, Juche 59 (1970), has more than 60 branch associations of specialists such as pharmaceutical, tumor and medical instrument associations, as well as provincial, city and county associations.
					
					 The association has scientific and technological exchange with international medical associations and other nations' public health organs and pharmaceutical and medical instrument companies."
					
					 The fax numbers of the Medical Association of Korea are 850-2-381-4410 and 850-2-381-4416."

articles.title: Automatic Kidney Examination Device Introduced in Pyongyang Hospital
articles.content:
Automatic Kidney Examination Device Introduced in Pyongyang Hospital
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Man Yu Hospital in Pyongyang has introduced a new automatic device for kidney examination. 
					 The device consists of a radioactive ray detector, high-pressure regulator and analysis software.
					
					 The detector is connected with computer.
					
					 Song Nam Hyok, a section chief of the hospital, told KCNA that the device takes only a minute to make an examination of kidney, its accuracy reaching 95 percent.
					
					 The device is well received by medical experts.

articles.title: Legislation on Foreign-funded Businesses Amended in DPRK
articles.content:
Legislation on Foreign-funded Businesses Amended in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK recently revised and supplemented legislation on foreign-funded businesses.
					 The law on labor in foreign-funded businesses breaks into 51 articles in 8 chapters, including employment of labor, conclusion of labor contract, work and rest, labor safety, social insurance and social security.
					
					 The revised law on financial management in foreign-funded businesses is made up of 72 articles in 10 chapters, while the law on accounts in the same businesses consists of 59 articles in 4 chapters.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally against FTA Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally against FTA Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations and opposition parties of south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Saturday in demand of the abrogation of shackling FTA with the U.S. It was sponsored by the Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. FTA.
					 At the rally speakers said that the FTA is a humiliating and unequal agreement as it was dealt behind the scenes by one percent group of those in power steeped in flunkeyism to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The 99 percent of the population demand the repeal of the agreement, they said.
					
					 They warned that the people would surely punish the 151 politicians who railroaded the "motion calling for ratification of FTA" in the forthcoming parliamentary elections.
					
					 In the meantime the authorities hurled six companies of police into the venue, creating terror-ridden atmosphere.

articles.title: Repression of Reunification Movement Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repression of Reunification Movement Criticized in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on Jan. 26 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist suppression.
					 The Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Jan. 25 detained and filed a suit against Ri Thae Hyong, a member of the South Headquarters, on charges of involvement in the spy-ring case.
					
					 Referring to this action, the statement contended that the case has already been proven to be cooked up in a political aim to crack down on the reunification movement organizations, the progressive forces.
					
					  No matter how desperately the authorities are creating the terror-ridden atmosphere, they will never dampen the people's will to achieve the independent reunification of the nation through implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, it said.
					
					 We will surely bring to the court of history the ultra-right conservative forces and their followers getting hell-bent on war moves and fascist suppression while engaging themselves in irregularities and corruption, the statement warned.
					
					 On the same day, the organization made public a commentary condemning the puppet authorities for violent repression of the reunification movement forces.

articles.title: National Reunification by Efforts of Koreans Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
National Reunification by Efforts of Koreans Urged in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a condolatory statement on Jan. 27, 12 years after the death of Kim Ryang Mu, permanent vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification. 
					 At the last moments of his life Kim ardently cried that he wanted to devote himself readily to reunification of the country, the statement noted. 
					
					 In the year when he died the historic Pyongyang summit was provided and the June 15 joint declaration adopted to usher in the new era of national reunification, it said, and continued: 
					
					 But, the danger of war ran high on the Korean Peninsula and the inter-Korean relations have been brought to catastrophe since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government".
					
					 It is urgent to check the Lee "government's" moves for confrontation and war with fellow countrymen and bring earlier the reunification of the country by efforts of the Korean nation. 
					
					 We will launch a vigorous struggle to prevent the Lee "government" and the "Grand National Party" from staying in power in the parliamentary and "presidential" elections to be held this year and open up a new era of democracy, people's life and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Reckless War Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
articles.content:
Reckless War Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The evermore undisguised war moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities are, indeed, adventurous saber-rattling aimed to strain to the maximum the situation on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and give spurs to the building of operational foundation for invading the DPRK under the absurd pretext of "danger" from it. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean warmongers plan to stage joint landing exercises with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the area of Phohang and conduct Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers. This suggests what they are after.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the said maneuvers are a replica of Team Spirit joint military exercises as they are a test nuclear war to invade the DPRK through a surprise attack, precision strike and use of troops for a special war and others.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers decided to mobilize U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in case somebody "starts a local war" and formally signed "a joint plan to cope with the local war," sharply increasing the danger of accidental military conflicts between the north and the south leading to an all-out war. The U.S. and south Korean militaries refrain from opening the above-said plan to the public in a bid to escape from domestic and foreign protest and denunciation of their dangerous scenario.
					
					 The prevailing situation indicates that a war may break out any moment on the Korean Peninsula due to the reckless war hysteria kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary will of the DPRK to react to the enemies' provocations with merciless retaliations and thus root out the very source of war so that they may not disturb peace on this land again, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: January Issue of Bulletin Thongil Published
articles.content:
January Issue of Bulletin Thongil Published 
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans published the January 2012 issue of Bulletin Thongil.
					 It carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It gave much space to the news that general secretary Kim Jong Il was awarded the title of Hero of the DPRK and Gold Star Medal and Order of National Flag First Class and Kim Jong Un assumed the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It carried news that Kim Jong Un inspected Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 Seen in the bulletin are the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea published on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 It conveyed reports of Russian media which said that the inter-Korean relations have been driven to a total collapse due to traitor Lee Myung Bak's moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: India Marks Republic Day
articles.content:
India Marks Republic Day 
 New Delhi, January 29 (KCNA) -- India held a military parade in the capital city on Jan. 26 to mark Republic Day.
					 Present were President Pratibha Devisingh Patil and people of different circles.
					
					 Latest arms and equipment including tanks and missiles came on show.

articles.title: India to Continue to Explore Options of Payment to Iran: Oil Minister
articles.content:
India to Continue to Explore Options of Payment to Iran: Oil Minister
 New Delhi, January 29 (KCNA) -- India will continue to explore "options" to make payments for crude oil it imports from Iran as it will only abide by UN sanctions and not those imposed by any bloc of countries, the Indian Oil Minister said on Jan. 25.
					 He rejected U.S. sanctions that deny access to the U.S. financial system by any foreign bank that conducts business with the Central Bank of Iran.
					
					 The Oil Minister further said, "We will continue to explore various options of payment to Iran."

articles.title: Iranian Leader's Top Advisor Says "No One Can Sell Oil if Iran Cannot"
articles.content:
Iranian Leader's Top Advisor Says "No One Can Sell Oil if Iran Cannot"
 Tehran, January 29 (KCNA) -- Ali-Akbar Velayati, foreign policy advisor to the leader of Iran's Islamic Revolution, said Thursday that "no one can sell oil if Iran cannot."
					 Velayati dismissed as "futile" the latest European Union (EU) sanctions on the country's oil exports, adding that the European decision to embargo Iran's oil exports is in no one's interest. 
					
					 The European policy makers are overlooking how the embargo may push up global oil prices, he said.

articles.title: Jordan's Lawmakers Condemn Arrest of Palestinian Parliament Speaker
articles.content:
Jordan's Lawmakers Condemn Arrest of Palestinian Parliament Speaker
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Jordan's Lower House on Wednesday condemned the arrest of Palestinian parliament speaker Aziz Dweik by Israeli forces.
					 "The arrest of Dweik is in violation of the international laws and is a stark violation of the international legitimacy as Dweik is a representative of the Palestinians and an elected member of the Palestinian legislative council," the 120-member lower house said in a statement.
					
					 Calling for the release of Dweik, the Lower House said it supports the Palestinians in the face of the Israeli occupation.

articles.title: Economic Losses in Japan, U.S.
articles.content:
Economic Losses in Japan, U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Food and beverage maker Kagome Co. of Japan said Thursday its group net profit for the April to December period of last year slipped 23.0 percent from a year earlier to 4.13 billion yen.
					 Meanwhile, United Continental Holdings of the United States announced Thursday that the airline recorded a fourth quarter loss of 138 million U.S. dollars in 2011.

articles.title: France Budget Gap in 2011
articles.content:
France Budget Gap in 2011
						
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- France registered a budget gap of 90.8 billion euros in 2011, the Budget minister of France said recently.

articles.title: Myanmar President Stresses Efforts for Eternal Peace
articles.content:
Myanmar President Stresses Efforts for Eternal Peace
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Myanmar President U Thein Sein said on Thursday that the government is making efforts to gain eternal peace in the country under the principles that are different from the past, claiming that the peace process is in good progress.
					 In his message to the opening of the third sessions of the two houses of the parliament, the president vowed that his government will work together with both houses of the parliament for the emergence of a modern and developed democratic nation under the concept of justice, freedom and equality.

articles.title: Cuba Not to Yield to U.S. Pressure: Fidel Castro
articles.content:
Cuba Not to Yield to U.S. Pressure: Fidel Castro
 Havana, January 29 (KCNA) -- Leader of Cuban revolution Fidel Castro recently clarified the country's stand not to yield to the U.S. pressure.
					 The Cuban law will be steadily and successfully enforced as it has been done for the past five decades and the country will never bow to the enemies' pressure, threat and blackmail, he said in an article.
					
					 The U.S. anti-Cuba propagandas are full of lies, the article said, warning that the U.S. and its allies will face politico-economic calamity for their stupidity.

articles.title: Cuba Rejects U.S. Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Cuba Rejects U.S. Smear Campaign 
 Havana, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Cuban Foreign Ministry recently rejected the anti-Cuban statements made by the U.S. administration, considering them as another example of the constant policy of aggression and interference in the country.
					 It is the U.S. government that uses torture and extrajudicial executions in the countries it attacks and exercises police brutality against its own population, said a high-ranking official of the ministry, adding:
					
					 In a colossal act of cynicism, the US government dares to condemn Cuba without justification.

articles.title: Jordan Reiterates Support for PNA
articles.content:
Jordan Reiterates Support for PNA
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Jordan on Jan. 23 reiterated support for the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) and the Palestinians in the struggle to realize their legitimate right in statehood.
					 Jordan fully supports the rights of the Palestinians in creating their independent and sovereign state with east Jerusalem as its capital, Jordanian Minister of Foreign Affairs Nasser Judeh said at a meeting with his Palestinian counterpart Riad Maliki.
					
					 The Jordanian minister said resolving all final status issues is a strategic interest for Jordan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Honored in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Honored in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was registered as honorary member of the Forum of Chief Editors of Bangladeshi Newspapers. 
					 A ceremony of conveying a certificate of honorary membership presented to him was held at the building of the Forum on Jan. 19.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Executive Committee of the Forum and chief editors of Bangladeshi newspapers.
					
					  The certificate was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh.
					
					 The certificate said:
					
					  The Forum of Chief Editors of Bangladeshi Newspapers has the honor of registering as honorary member Your Excellency Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK who has made an immortal contribution to global independence while leading to victory the cause of building a thriving nation, the lifelong desire of HE President Kim Il Sung and HE general secretary Kim Jong Il, with their loving care for the people.

articles.title: Chairman of the Party of Finland issued a statement
articles.content:
Chairman of the Party of Finland issued a statement
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Hannu Harju, chairman of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism, issued a statement on Jan. 20 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il had wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people for nearly half a century, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 He was a great statesman who defended Korean-style socialism, exploring an untrodden path of revolution, not an ordinary one, for a long period.
					
					 The collapse of socialism in the Soviet Union and other East European countries early in the 1990s had not a few adverse impact not only on the world socialist movement but on socialist economy in the DPRK. Worse still, the Korean people had to undergo unbearable pain and ordeal due to the consecutive years of natural disasters.
					
					 But under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK did not yield to them but rose up to be a stronger country and its defence capability reached the highest level. Such marvelous events in the DPRK are the brilliant fruition of the Songun politics pursued by him.
					
					 It was thanks to the Songun politics that socialist construction in the DPRK could continue advancing without retreat despite the ceaseless obstructions of the imperialist reactionaries and peace and stability could be ensured on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people wrought world-startling miracles one after another in socialist construction despite imperialists' all sorts of sanctions and offensives to stifle the DPRK by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The feats Kim Jong Il performed by always devoting his all to the people's happiness and greatly contributing to accomplishing the human cause of independence will shine long in the history of the international labor movement.

articles.title: DPRK's Law on Higher Education Introduced by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Law on Higher Education Introduced by Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Majodur on Jan. 22 carried an article titled "DPRK Law on Higher Education".
					 The DPRK Law on Higher Education was adopted, the paper said, introducing its provisions.
					
					 The adoption of the law will help develop the organization and operation of higher educational institutions in the DPRK and education and scientific researches there on a new stage, the paper noted, adding that it will also help produce a larger number of competent scientists, technicians and experts prepared politically and ideologically and possessed of a high level of scientific and technological knowledge and creative ingenuity.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Russia,Ukraine
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Russia,Ukraine
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committees for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il were respectively inaugurated with due ceremonies in Russia and Ukraine on Jan. 23.
					 At the inaugural ceremonies V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and Prof. and Dr. Gennadi Berdyshev of Kiev University of Ukraine were elected chairmen of the committees.
					
					 The committees decided to hold various political and cultural events including meetings and seminars on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ve concierto de banda militar del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ve concierto de banda militar del EPC
 Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, presencio el concierto de la banda militar del EPC.
					 Tras interpretado el Himno Nacional, los espectadores guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo maximo tributo a la memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 En la ocasion fueron ejecutadas las musicas de instrumentos de viento "Kim Jong Il es eterno como el Sol", "Marcha del Ejercito Popular de Corea", la misma en serie "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria", "Cancion de artilleros costeros" y otras piezas.
					
					 Los ejecutantes demostraron orgullosamente el animo combativo y el poderio invencible del heroico EPC con las vibraciones sonoras y melodias ligeras y llamativas provenientes de sus instrumentos.
					
					 Kim Jong Un evaluo que los interpretes ofrecieron este concierto, que llama al EPC y al pueblo de Corea a la lucha revolucionaria, manteniendo bien las peculiaridades de banda militar.
					
					 Elogio a los creadores y ejecutantes de la banda diciendo que ellos se esforzaron mucho con la inteligencia colectiva por materializar consecuentemente en la creacion las instrucciones del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. En este curso, salio bien orquestada cada pieza, se elevo el nivel de interpretacion de los directores y se renovaron los metodos de ejecucion, dijo.
					
					 Kim Jong Un dio indicaciones valiosas que serviran de directiva en las futuras funciones de la banda.
					
					 Preciso que los creadores y ejecutantes de la banda deben dinamizar sus actividades de creacion sin perder el atributo de entidad artistica del heroico EPC.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos interpretaran de modo estentoreo las canciones de lucha para llamar a los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun del partido.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, U Tong Chuk y otros cuadros directivos de los organos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios de guerra EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios de guerra EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Las abiertas maniobras belicas de Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas son una aventura orientada a agravar al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico cuestionando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y acelerar el establecimiento de la base operacional para agredir a esta.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					 Los belicistas surcoreanos intentan librar junto con los efectivos agresores norteamericanos un entrenamiento conjunto de desembarco en la zona de Phohang y los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					 Es bien conocido que esos ejercicios significan una prueba de guerra nuclear para agredir a la RPDC con el ataque sorpresivo, el de precision y el despliegue de tropas especiales, siendo la nueva version de "Team Spirit", nombre de anterior entrenamiento conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					 Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos acordaron movilizar en el tiempo de "provocacion local" de alguien a los uniformados norteamericanos y firmaron oficialmente el "plan de enfrentamiento conjunto a la provocacion local".
					
					 Esto multiplico el peligro de la conversion en una guerra total de cualquier choque armado eventual entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					 Los circulos militares de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea no se atreven a publicar el "plan" mencionado porque quieren eludir las protestas y criticas de los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					 La situacion dada muestra que debido a las locuras belicas de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak, unida a las fuerzas foraneas, puede estallar la guerra en cualquier momento en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Es firme la voluntad revolucionaria de la RPDC de responder a la provocacion con implacable y anonadante golpe de venganza y eliminar asi de la fuente de guerra, de modo que los belicistas no puedan violar mas nunca la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el "siglo del Pacifico de EE.UU."
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el "siglo del Pacifico de EE.UU."
 Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos publico la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional fundamentada en mantener su "posicion directiva" en el mundo.
					 Al mismo tiempo, las fuerzas belicistas de la capa militar de EE.UU. difunden como hecho real el rumor de la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando tanto del "peor programa" e "incertidumbre".
					
					 La region de Asia-Pacifico se convierte ahora en el centro de las fuerzas del mundo.
					
					 El imperio intenta actuar como emperador del mundo convirtiendo el siglo XXI en el "siglo del Pacifico de EE.UU.".
					
					 Este proyecto es la nueva version de la politica exterior de EE.UU. encaminada a monopolizar los intereses politicos y economicos de la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					 En una palabra, la recien publicada estrategia de defensa nacional de EE.UU. es la de guerra enfocada en Asia-Pacifico que toma como blancos principales a Corea y China.
					
					 Al crear la crisis en la Peninsula Coreana, mantener las tensiones y fortalecer la presencia e intervencion militar en Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. pretende tomar y controlar esta region presionando militarmente a China, su rival estrategico mas grande, y preservar la heguemonia mundial.
					
					 De ahi que apoya e instiga militarmente al Sur de Corea, Japon y otros aliados exagerando la supuesta "amenaza" proveniente de la RPDC.
					
					 Contrarrestar con la fuerza las influencias de otras potencias sobre la region y establecer el orden de dominio imperialista bajo el protagonismo de EE.UU., he aqui la peligrosidad y el caracter reaccionario de su nueva estrategia de defensa.
					
					 Debido a la ilimitada codicia imperialista y aventura militar de EE.UU., se generan seria amenaza a la paz y estabilidad de Asia-Pacifico y el peligro de nueva guerra fria.
					
					 Antes de pensar en el "siglo del Pacifico de EE.UU.", el imperio debera recordar sus amargos fracasos sufridos en Corea en el siglo pasado.

articles.title: Creado afiche dedicado al Dia de la Estrella Luz de Corea
articles.content:
Creado afiche dedicado al Dia de la Estrella Luz de Corea
 Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Se ha creado un afiche con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					 El pasado dia 12, el Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publico la informacion especial sobre la institucion de esa efemeride.
					
					 El afiche, creado por primera vez despues de instituido el Dia de la Estrella Luz, demuestra la conviccion y voluntad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de eternizar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 En el aparecen la casa natal del Dirigente en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu y la flor Kimjongilia y en su trasfondo esta dibujado el pico Jong Il.
					
					 Se leen igualmente las frases "El 70o aniversario de natalicio del gran Dirigente, camarada      Kim Jong Il", "Dia de la Estrella Luz" y "Conmemoracion".
					
					 El afiche hace recordar con profunda emocion la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente quien nacio en el monte Paektu, dirigio por varias decadas a la victoria la revolucion coreana y la causa de independencia de la humanidad y trabajo duro por el pueblo hasta el ultimo momento de su gran vida.
